title: Still paying good prices for graded Cycle, AB, EPDG, Tolstoi...

posts.post_title: Still paying good prices for graded Cycle, AB, EPDG, Tolstoi...

posts.post_content: Have gotten a few emails and made a few more purchases.  Slow weekend on eBay so good time for something here.  Cards must be graded and 3 or higher.  Thanks.  GM
Bump, as I am still in the market. If you haven't already replied, feel free.
